text:
Hello all! I have an issue with unused javascript with HubSpot - are there any settings I can use to remove script for features I am not using? Details of the issues: <https://pagespeed.web.dev/analysis/https-classysavers-com/xmt3enjwf2?form_factor=mobile|https://pagespeed.web.dev/analysis/https-classysavers-com/xmt3enjwf2?form_factor=mobile>

Files with unused js: <https://static.hsappstatic.net/conversations-visitor-ui/static-1.16813/bundles/visitor.js|https://static.hsappstatic.net/conversations-visitor-ui/static-1.16813/bundles/visitor.js>

<https://static.hsappstatic.net/HubSpot-dlb/static-1.438/bundle.production.js|https://static.hsappstatic.net/HubSpot-dlb/static-1.438/bundle.production.js>

Your help is much appreciated, thank you!

Hi,

Can I develop a feature within HubSpot myself?
Is there any possibility?

Please suggest.

Thanks,
I think you can build the different theme and choose a template from that theme while creating a pages for that domain.
it depends on what you wanna build

Hi <@UNWHHSWHJ>!
Thanks for your response.

As we have a built-in Products object in HubSpot, I want to fetch the products from the Infor ERP to my HubSpot CRM.

this needs a custom coding if you wanna fetch some data from outside into HubSpot. you can use zapier or any kind of automation tool, make a custom coded workflow within HubSpot or build any tool and host it
Hey <@UNWHHSWHJ>, thanks for the help! You can switch themes on the fly for each page then just swap back the theme on the main domain. Seems to be the best work around at the moment.

Hmm...
That makes sense.

Let me further further dig into it and confirm the approach with you.

Actually I was wondering, if I can code within HubSpot just like we can write custom features in Salesforce, SugarCRM and SuiteCRM.

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/crm-development-tools-overview|https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/crm-development-tools-overview>

With HubSpot enterprise you can
Hi! Is it possible to trigger a marketing email with API? So when you press “Send” from a custom form, you can send a marketing email by using APIs.
Just updated my question hehe! It might be solved with WF too?
hehe, yeah, thats why i deleted it ..
Thank you :slightly_smiling_face:
probably, but why all this hassle? just create your custom form, submit the HubSpot form via API and handle email with workflows
sending a marketing email should be possible with Wf... just depends if you have the right trigger, right?
Totally agree, its a big hassle :see_no_evil:
thanks <@UV23JHEJY>, that sounds like a good solution!
yes, thank you!
Yes

:orange_heart:*Please take a moment to review our Code of Conduct*:orange_heart:

We want the HubSpot Developer community to be inclusive and welcoming. By following our Code of Conduct, you can help ensure that's the case.

TL;DR:
• Be respectful
• Be inclusive (try not to say, "Hey guys, hey boys, hey [any specific group]")
• No self promotion, except for <#C0121KGC6RM|showcase> and <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> 
• No unsolicited DMs
Read the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/slack/code-of-conduct|whole thing here> - and thanks for being a part of the HubSpot Developer Community!

Want to report a violation? DM <@UQNEXHW14> or fill out the <https://form.asana.com/?k=p7aM0fpd3G4JGETDL_nYXg&d=8587152060687|anonymous form here>.

Hello - we do not seem to have a channel for cms-search - looking for information on its capabilities - how it can be used with a ecommerce subdomain etc.

Update:  I found the following: <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/content/search-for-content> but this is still just for content of a sub-domain - which is our ecommerce site.  Am I missing something on how it will pull all the product information that is stored in the ecommerce db?  is it going to walk through all the pages - similar to how google might do it.
Hey <@U02KB4LP86M> and <@U05S3FTJ6F7> - looping back, have y'all been thinking anything through? I'd love to chat if so!
Hey Rob, where are you at with this?

Hey all! Is anyone else noticing themes and "coded" assets like modules being rolled back to previous version and the version history go missing?
We've had 2 clients today report that updates we had made are no longer present in the portal and missing any history of the update being made. We do know on our end it is happening by checking updates in our project management software.

Hey there <@U021JKWA1GB>, have you contacted HubSpot support yet?

<http://help.HubSpot.com|help.HubSpot.com>
If not, please do so. They will be able to get engineering involved and keep you updated.

For anyone else curious about this, I have not currently heard of any other reports of this, if you have experienced this please also contact HubSpot support.

I would appreciate if you can send me the HubSpot support ticket ID as well.

Hello! (Let me know if this should be in a different channel) I'm having trouble adding either a google font or a custom font to my website. I've tried adding the google @ import code into the HEAD html in the advanced settings, but I still don't see the font available in any of the page editing options. Would greatly appreciate any help, thank you!
Hi Jessica, you don't need to import Google Fonts, HubSpot is doing that automatically
Custom Fonts can be loaded via the base.html in your themes Template directory. However you wont be able to select them via the font dropdowns
Thanks Andreas! Regarding Google fonts - if already in there, how do I get them to appear in the font options here?
Which font are you missing?
Arimo
Is IT a variable Font?
I think so? <https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Arimo>

Nevermind, that is not important. You cant change the font for this section heading, its limited to the fonts you see there. Try opening the theme settings and change IT there. Then switch out the section heading with a RichText Field
RichText - that makes sense. But theme settings - not sure - I'll take a look. Thank you!
<@UBT0AHWLD> added Arimo to my theme! But it's not showing via font dropdowns:
Maybe I need to upgrade? I've been editing in free. Maybe I need to move to "starter"?
